attributes.action: Convicted UK rioters should loose all benefits
attributes.additional_details:
Convicted UK rioters should loose all benefits until they have repaid with Community Service the damage they have caused during their offences.

Any persons convicted of criminal damage or burglary should have all financial benefits removed until they have repaid society. No tax payer should have to contribute to those who have destroyed property, stolen from their community and shown a disregard for the country that provides for them.
